actions.text: Mr. Frelinghuysen raised a point of order against the Tonko amendment (A018). Mr. Frelinghuysen stated that the amendment increased net budget authority. The Chair sustained the point of order.

purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $145,000,000 and reduce funds in the Nuclear Energy account by $50,000,000; the Fossil Energy Research and Development account by $40,000,000; and the Weapons Activites account by $55,000,000.
